title: Hermes Application WASM Component Module Manifest Schema
description: Defines the src packages which are used to build a Hermes WASM Component Module.

$schema.title: Application Package Manifest Schema Reference
$schema.description:
Reference to the Application Manifest Schema.
Should be to https:// this will be validated.
Local references are only to simplify development.

name.title: Hermes Module Package name.
name.description: Name of the Hermes WASM Module Package with which it will be created.

metadata.title: Hermes Module Metadata File
metadata.description:
Link to the Hermes Module Metadata json file.
Will be renamed to `metadata.json` inside the module.

component.title: WASM Component File
component.description:
Link to the Hermes Module WASM Component file.
This is a fully compiled and linked WASM Object file.
Will be renamed to `module.wasm` inside the module.

config.title: Application Module Config Object.
config.description: Object representing the Application Module Config File.

file.title: Application Module Config File Location
file.description:
Path to the WASM Component Library Module Config File.
This will be renamed to `config.json` inside the module.

schema.title: Application Module Config Schema Location
schema.description:
Path to the WASM Component Module Config Schema File.
This will be renamed to `config.schema.json` inside the module.

settings.title: Application Module Settings Object.
settings.description: Object representing the Application Module Settings.

schema.title: Application Module Settings Schema Location
schema.description:
Path to the WASM Component Module Settings Schema File.
This will be renamed to `settings.schema.json` inside the module.

share.title: Application Module Share Dataset.
share.description:
Path to the WASM Component Library Module Shareable Data.
Will set the default data defined for the module itself.
